src:
プレミア、メキシコ１位通過決定

04 Nov 2019

　【グアダラハラ（メキシコ）共同】野球の東京五輪予選を兼ねた国際大会「第２回プレミア１２」は３日、メキシコのグアダラハラ郊外で１次ラウンドＡ組の２試合が行われ、メキシコが米国に８-２で快勝し、２連勝として１位での２次ラウンド進出を決めた。
　ドミニカ共和国がオランダを１４-４の七回コールドゲームで下し、初白星を挙げた。オランダは２連敗で敗退が決まった。メキシコは米国かドミニカ共和国のどちらかと２勝１敗で並ぶ可能性があるが、両チームには直接対決で勝っているため１位が確定した。
　日本は５日に開幕するＢ組でベネズエラ、プエルトリコ、台湾と２次ラウンド進出を争う。
text:
Premier, Mexico 1st place decision

04 Nov 2019

[Cooperation with Guadalajara (Mexico)] The international tournament “2nd Premier 12”, which also served as a baseball qualifier for the Tokyo Olympics, was played on the 3rd in the first round of A group in the suburb of Guadalajara, Mexico. -2 wins well and decided to advance to the 2nd round in 1st place as 2 wins.
ド The Dominican Republic defeated the Netherlands in the 7th cold game of 14-4 and gave the first white star. The Netherlands was defeated with two consecutive losses. Mexico may be in the US or the Dominican Republic with 2 wins and 1 loss, but both teams won the first place because they were winning directly.
Japan will compete with Venezuela, Puerto Rico, and Taiwan for the second round with Group B starting on the 5th.
